channel.title: Welcome to my blog on SparkBang
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to my blog on SparkBang

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: What is going on here? Welcome. You have stumbled upon my project log. This is the central space where I will be recording the progress of both my ongoing and completed projects. Call it a project journal if you will. I’ll stick with Blog for now because calling it a “Project log” or “Plog” won’t be worth the extra explanation. Why have a project log at all? As has already been explained in detail by a good friend - recording a project serves as a great way to round off a project and know when it is actually done.
